title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - E-jets 175 - from dark to operational
description:
In this video we will go through the process of start the Embraer 175 from dark to fully operational. This is done based on a checklist which is available from within the simulator but is missing some steps which we will discuss. Also we look at the individual displays and how you can use them to monitor the aircraft during the different stages of the startup.

After having a look at how to install it we will walk through the panel to see what functionalities are available.
